title: Bug 6304: Cannot synchronize a .java file and another resource
OB: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the Team entry is missing from the context menu.
EB: The Team entry should be present in the context menu when attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open the context menu for a .java file. 2. Look for the Team entry in the context menu. It should be present, but it is missing.
